mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.nickname AS "nickname", a.sex AS "sex", a.photo AS "photo", a.identity_number AS "identityNumber", a.edu_major AS "eduMajor", a.high_education AS "highEducation", a.birthday AS "birthday", a.tel AS "tel", a.telchecked AS "telchecked", a.email AS "email", a.emailchecked AS "emailchecked", a.qq AS "qq", a.area AS "area", a.address AS "address", a.currentstatus AS "currentstatus", a.ismarried AS "ismarried", a.unit AS "unit", a.university AS "university", a.start_workyear AS "startWorkyear", a.intention AS "intention", a.blog_url AS "blogUrl", a.constellation AS "constellation", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_info( id, name, nickname, sex, photo, identity_number, edu_major, high_education, birthday, tel, telchecked, email, emailchecked, qq, area, address, currentstatus, ismarried, unit, university, start_workyear, intention, blog_url, constellation, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{sex}, #{photo}, #{identityNumber}, #{eduMajor}, #{highEducation}, #{birthday}, #{tel}, #{telchecked}, #{email}, #{emailchecked}, #{qq}, #{area}, #{address}, #{currentstatus}, #{ismarried}, #{unit}, #{university}, #{startWorkyear}, #{intention}, #{blogUrl}, #{constellation}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE user_info SET name = #{name}, nickname = #{nickname}, sex = #{sex}, photo = #{photo}, identity_number = #{identityNumber}, edu_major = #{eduMajor}, high_education = #{highEducation}, birthday = #{birthday}, tel = #{tel}, telchecked = #{telchecked}, email = #{email}, emailchecked = #{emailchecked}, qq = #{qq}, area = #{area}, address = #{address}, currentstatus = #{currentstatus}, ismarried = #{ismarried}, unit = #{unit}, university = #{university}, start_workyear = #{startWorkyear}, intention = #{intention}, blog_url = #{blogUrl}, constellation = #{constellation}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM user_info a
WHERE tel = #{tel} and del_flag = 0

SELECT
FROM user_info a
WHERE email = #{email} and del_flag = 0
